EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR General - Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Additional_Resource_Request__c.Additional_Resource__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your access request {!IF(ISPICKVAL(Additional_Resource_Request__c.Access_Level__c, ""), "", "as ")}{!Additional_Resource_Request__c.Access_Level__c} for {!Additional_Resource_Request__c.Additional_Resource__c} has been completed. If you have any questions or want a demo of the Nokia Partner Portal and its functionalities, please feel free to contact our Nokia Partner support desk at: partner.support@nokia.com
The Nokia Global Partner Team
